paragraphs.text: Tarachodidae is a now obsolete family in the order Mantodea, of genera found in Africa and Asia.[1]

paragraphs.title: Former subfamilies
paragraphs.text:
The family previously consisted of two subfamilies of "bark mantises":[2]

These genera have now been moved to the new families: 

This subfamily has now been moved to the Eremiaphilidae.
These genera are now placed in the subfamily Iridinae:
